resources.string: Hope you are enjoying the feature of Language Translator. Please take a moment and rate the application. Thank you
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Scan only the latin languages like Catalan,Danish,Dutch,English,Finnish,French,German,Hungarian,Italian,Latin,Norwegian, Polish,Portugese,Romanian,Spanish,Swedish,Tagalog,Turkish.
Smart Language Translator will automatically detect the language from Copied/Voice/Input text. We recommend to select the primary language to translate the text.
Select the primary language to translate
Permission need to detect the text for better translation feature
